column2: "It's nice spring weather, so I want to add some physical activity to the event!"
"A well-crafted set of rules is vital when making a game! It's no fun if you win easily or lose right away!"
"Maybe some restrictions would be good... Ugh, the problem is I can't decide where to begin."
"I need ideas! If you come up with any suggestions for a fun set of rules, can you please tell me?"
